hk.ust.cse.comp4321.proj1

Class CrawlUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • hk.ust.cse.comp4321.proj1.CrawlUtils

  • public class CrawlUtils
extends Object
    The CrawlUtils class is an utility class that contains utility methods for assisting the crawling procedure.

    • Method Detail

      • extractWords

        public static Vector<String> extractWords(org.jsoup.nodes.Document doc)
        Extracts words in the web page content.

        note: uses StringTokenizer to tokenize the result

        Parameters:
        doc - the document to be extracted
        Returns:
        a list of words in the web page body

      • extractTitleWords

        public static Vector<String> extractTitleWords(String title)
        Extracts words from the title String
        Parameters:
        title - {String} the title
        Returns:
        a vector of strings in title

      • extractLinks

        public static Vector<String> extractLinks(org.jsoup.nodes.Document doc)
        Extracts useful external urls on the web page.

        note: filter out images, emails, etc.

        Parameters:
        doc - the document to be extracted
        Returns:
        a list of external links on the web page

      • urlPreprocess

        public static URL urlPreprocess(URL currentUrl,
                                String url)
                         throws MalformedURLException
        Processes relative url to absolute url.

        If it is absolute path, i.e., contains 'http' keyword, returns url. currentUrl and url shall not be empty or null

        Parameters:
        currentUrl - the url of the page it is processing at
        url - the url retrieved in the current url
        Returns:
        processed URL
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException

      • filterUrl

        public static boolean filterUrl(String linkString)
        Returns false for unwanted junk links. A filter for filtering out unwanted junk links.

        The filter will remove all opaque links and all absolute links that is not in http or https scheme.

        Parameters:
        linkString - the link to be processed
        Returns:
        true if the link is wanted

      • removeURIFragment

        public static String removeURIFragment(String linkString)
        Removes the fragment part of an URL.
        Parameters:
        linkString - the url with fragment to be removed
        Returns:
        the url with the fragment part removed
